resource.name: Police Active Warrants
resource.description:
This dataset represents all active warrants recorded by the Norfolk Police Department. Warrants can be searched by type of crime, demographics of persons involved and total number of outstanding warrants.  This dataset is updated daily.  

Note: this dataset does not contain any active warrants that could possibly:
•	jeopardize an ongoing investigation, or prosecution, or the safety of an individual, 
•	cause a suspect to flee or evade detection,
•	result in the destruction of evidence.
columns_description: Denotes the date of birth of the person listed on the active warrant
Denotes the height of the person listed on the active warrant
Denotes the Date the warrant was issued
Denotes the first name of the person listed on the active warrant
Denotes the Charge on the Active Warrant
Denotes the last name of the person listed on the active warrant
Denotes the eye color of the person listed on the active warrant
Denotes the hair color of the person on the active warrant
Denotes the weight of the person on the active warrant
Denotes the sex of the person listed on the Active warrant
Denotes the Race of the person listed on the active warrant

resource.name: Police Arrest Reports
resource.description: This dataset represents all arrests that occurred in the last 24 hours as recorded by the Norfolk Police Department.  This dataset is updated daily.
columns_description: Denotes the charge of the offense
Denotes the date of the arrest
Denotes the date of birth of the arrestee
Denotes the last name of the arrestee
Denotes the weight of the arrestee
Denotes the first name of the arrestee
Denotes the height of the arrestee
Denotes the sex of the arrestee
Denotes the sex of the arrestee
Denotes the hair color of the arrestee
Denotes the eye color of the arrestee

resource.name: Police Incident Reports
resource.description: This dataset contains incident reports recorded by the Norfolk Police Department that occurred over the last five years. Incidents can be searched by type, location, date and time of occurrence.  This dataset is updated daily.
columns_description: Name of the street where the incident occurred
Block number where the incident occurred
Police precinct where the incident occurred
Police zone where the incident occurred
Identification number assigned to incident
Planning District where the incident occurred
Police sector where the incident occurred
Hour the incident occurred
Day of the week the incident occurred
A description of the incident
Name of neighborhood where the offense occurred
Date the incident occurred

resource.name: Employee Salaries
resource.description: This dataset provides base salary information about City of Norfolk employees.  This data is provided by Norfolk's Department of Human Resources and is updated daily.
resource.attribution: Ramona Benson, Department of Human Resources
columns_description: If applicable, the specific division, bureau, or unit an employee is in within the department.
Textual description of Fair Labor Standards Act (FLSA) classification of the position Exempt (in-eligible for overtime) or Non-Exempt (eligible for overtime)
Earliest date of employment in the current position for the employee
Textual description of the position name
Hourly Rate x the normal scheduled hours for the position
Identification of the department name
Description of employment type (ex. Full-time, Part-time, etc.)
Earliest date of employment with the City of Norfolk for the employee

resource.name: Permits and Inspections
resource.description: This dataset provides information about permits and their associated inspections, violations, and status information. Norfolk’s Development Service Center (DSC) issues building, plumbing, mechanical, electrical, fire, amusement, elevator, certificates of occupancy, and zoning permits.  The purpose of the DSC is to consolidate acquisition of permits to one central location within Norfolk City Hall for the convenience of customers. This dataset is updated daily.
resource.attribution: Phil Winslow; Codes Enforcement Team Lead, Department of City Planning
columns_description: The square footage of the building on the issued permit
Permit number assigned
Address the permit is assigned to
Date permit application was submitted on
Date the permit has been issued on
Type of permit issued (i.e. building, mechanical, plumbing, fire, electrical, etc.)
Status of the permit
Use class assigned on the permit (residential or commercial)
Type of work the permit allows for (i.e. new, replacement, service upgrade)
Description of work the permit is issued for
The structure type the permit is issued for (i.e. building, porch, deck, garage, etc.)
Total fee amount for the issued permit
Total amount payment made on the issued permit
Total balance due on the issued permit
Cost of the project the permit is issued for
Type of use group designation for the permit issued
Designates if there are work items associated with the permit
Category code and detail type of the inspection
Group responsible for the inspection (i.e. fire, electrical, codes/zoning, etc.)
Inspection number assigned
Current status of the inspection
The date the inspection was scheduled
The date the inspection was completed
Five-year date of the next inspection for renewal of permit
Annual inspection date for the renewal of permit
Date the permit was finalized
Use type classification the permit is issued for
Coding classification for the use groups
Designates who has applied for the permit for a specific job
Designates if permit being issued is located on parcel in the flood zone
The zip code for the location of the issued permit
Ward the issued permit location is located in
Super Ward the issued permit is located in
Georeferenced column of XY coordinates of the location of the permit issued
Grid Parcel Identification Number generated to provide a unique identifier for each parcel

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'US Counties' (25t2-rbz7) the point in column 'geocoded_column' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Civic Leagues' (x6fk-ihs5) the point in column 'geocoded_column' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Civic Leagues_uniq_prepend' (b3ci-nw94) the point in column 'geocoded_column' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Civic Leagues_from_ktui_fihj' (38t5-wna6) the point in column 'geocoded_column' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.
Designates if the permit will require a certificate of occupancy to be issued
Designates if the permit is for a narrow lot
Designates if the permit being issued structure (building, deck, porch) is in the flood zone

resource.name: Norfolk Master Street List
resource.description: Information containing the master list of valid street names in the City.  Street names may include a directional that is fully spelled out (i.e., East, West, North, or South) depending on how the street name was legally recorded. Those streets with a pre-directional (i.e., N, S, E, W) before the street name will be listed twice in this index, once under the first letter of the street name and again using the pre-direction. For example, W Brambleton Avenue will be listed both under W and under B. Street status field also indicates where a street is located: city, military base, or crosses over both military base and city.
columns_description: The primary name field that identifies the street.  Street names can be words or numbers.
Directional word found as the first word in the street name and there is no other directional to the left of it.
Full Street Name
Status as to where the Street is located: City, Base, City & Base, Paper, Private.
A component that qualifies the street name by type of street such as AVE(Avenue), DR (Drive), or RD (Road).
Directional word found as last word in the street name and there is no other directional to the right of it.
A component that qualifies the street name by type of street such as AVE(Avenue), DR (Drive), or RD (Road).

resource.name: Property Assessment and Sales - FY23
resource.description: This dataset represents real estate assessment and sales data made available by the Office of the Real Estate Assessor. This dataset contains information for properties in the city, including acreage, square footage, GPIN, street address, year built, current land value, current improvement value, and current total value. The information is obtained from the Office of the Real Estate Assessor ProVal records database. This dataset is updated daily on weekdays.
resource.attribution: Norfolk Office of the Real Estate Assessor
columns_description: Land Record Serial Number
Year built of the primary dwelling on the parcel
Geographic Parcel Identification Number
Most recent assessment year
Street name of the property
The identifier for the house, building or other feature which follows the address number itself, often indicating a unit number; such as 200 Hyde Park Road, Unit 2C.
Document number associated with the most recent sale of the parcel
Approximate area of a commercial building
Most recent assessed total value of the parcel
Street number of the property
Street type of the property
Most recent seller/giver of the parcel
Approximate finished living area of the property
Approximate square footage of the parcel
Property class code and description
Street direction of the property
Approximate acreage of the parcel
The word that follows the name of a street to further describe that street; for example, London Bridge Road Ext.
Zip code of the property
Most recent buyer/receiver of the parcel
City in which the property is located
Most recent sale date of the parcel
Label assigned to improvements/buildings located on the parcel.  (Extensions beginning in “R” indicates residential, “C” indicates commercial, “L” indicates land-only)
Current owner of the parcel
Most recent assessed land value of the parcel
The legal description of the parcel
Parcel Identification Number
Most recent assessed building value of the parcel
Use type of the parcel
Most recent sale price of the parcel
